title: How Defenses Will Perform in 2022
description:
Following Sheil’s list, he and Lindsay go through the league and debate which defense will lead the NFL and which ones can also take a leap this upcoming season.

Hosts: Sheil Kapadia and Lindsay Jones
Associate Producer: Stefan Anderson
Additional Production Supervision: Arjuna Ramgopal and Conor Nevins
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
